titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and Council, a proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Their Majesties being graciously pleased that such of their Irish subjects as by the articles of Limerick dated the 3d day of October, 1691 are in a summary way to be restored by the government to their estates of freehold and inheritances, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to Their Most Excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin the 11th day of January, 1691.".
Dated according to Lady Day dating.
For claims under the treaty of Limerick.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 201. such what Year.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
